name: Loop (itch) (Matthewbuy)
description:
W, A, S, D to move.

Space to jump.

Game made by Brazilians: Mateus and Gabriel.

Game Story:

Many people wonder what really happens when we are sleeping, what dreams are and why they exist. However, what is not known is that dreams are nothing more than a journey from your consciousness to another plane, this journey only happens when our mind enters a state of rest, after that it finally happens, our minds can access that place.

It is known as the World of Dreams, and its main function is to treat our conscience, causing bad and stressful days to be forgotten, or even that your mind has a moment of calm and serenity, so that when you return to your body, returning upon waking up, manage to follow another day in a more peaceful way.

However, not everything is easy, the World of Dreams ends up receiving many people loaded with negativity, life problems, health problems, among others, when they go to the Dreams plan they end up recovering, but leaving all this negative charge there, this with the over time it became a problem. In a plane of existence, where anything can happen, this great remnant of negativity ended up taking shape and life, a being that aims to corrupt the dreams of the people that enter this world, and then feed on their negative dreams, the Devourers of Dreams.

Now you the dreamer needs to return to your body and wake up, but be careful, even if the path is not difficult, the Dream Eaters are always willing to find a careless dreamer, you need to be quick and smart, get out of the dream plan o as quickly as possible and avoid these boring creatures.
